tweet.Original_tweet: you can fail at what you don't like, so you might as well take a chance at doing what you love
tweet.Translate_tweet: you can fail at what you don't like, so you might as well take a chance at doing what you love

tweet.Original_tweet: sometimes you have to wait a moment for your moment
tweet.Translate_tweet: sometimes you have to wait a moment for your moment

tweet.Original_tweet: trust your struggle
tweet.Translate_tweet: trust your struggle

tweet.Original_tweet: you can't live a positive life with a negative mind
tweet.Translate_tweet: you can't live a positive life with a negative mind

tweet.Original_tweet: every day may not be good. but there's something good in everyday
tweet.Translate_tweet: every day may not be good. but there's something good in everyday

tweet.Original_tweet: learn your craft. practice your craft. know your craft. breathe your craft. love your craft. live your craft. be your craft.
tweet.Translate_tweet: learn your craft. practice your craft. know your craft. breathe your craft. love your craft. live your craft. be your craft.

tweet.Original_tweet: one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day
tweet.Translate_tweet: one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day

tweet.Original_tweet: small daily improvements are the key to staggering long-term results
tweet.Translate_tweet: small daily improvements are the key to staggering long-term results

tweet.Original_tweet: be open to whatever comes next
tweet.Translate_tweet: be open to whatever comes next

tweet.Original_tweet: speak the truth even if your voice shakes
tweet.Translate_tweet: speak the truth even if your voice shakes

tweet.Original_tweet: challenges make life interesting, however, overcoming them is what makes life meaningful
tweet.Translate_tweet: challenges make life interesting, however, overcoming them is what makes life meaningful

tweet.Original_tweet: learn how to be happy with what you have while you pursue all that you want
tweet.Translate_tweet: learn how to be happy with what you have while you pursue all that you want

tweet.Original_tweet: life becomes easier when you learn to accept an apology you never got
tweet.Translate_tweet: life becomes easier when you learn to accept an apology you never got

tweet.Original_tweet: desire is the starting point of all achievement, not a hope, not a wish, but a keen pulsating desire, which transcends everything
tweet.Translate_tweet: desire is the starting point of all achievement, not a hope, not a wish, but a keen pulsating desire, which transcends everything

tweet.Original_tweet: oh yes, the past can hurt. but the way i see it you can either run from it or learn from it
tweet.Translate_tweet: oh yes, the past can hurt. but the way i see it you can either run from it or learn from it

tweet.Original_tweet: we are not given a good life or a bad life. we are given a life. it's up to us to make it good or bad
tweet.Translate_tweet: we are not given a good life or a bad life. we are given a life. it's up to us to make it good or bad

tweet.Original_tweet: if you are willing to sacrifice so that you can follow your dreams and you stay on course no matter how hard things get, great things will happen
tweet.Translate_tweet: if you are willing to sacrifice so that you can follow your dreams and you stay on course no matter how hard things get, great things will happen

tweet.Original_tweet: anger, hatred and jealousy never solve problems, only affection, concern and respect can do that
tweet.Translate_tweet: anger, hatred and jealousy never solve problems, only affection, concern and respect can do that

tweet.Original_tweet: failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success
tweet.Translate_tweet: failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success

tweet.Original_tweet: if you want something you have to work for it. if you don't get it, work harder
tweet.Translate_tweet: if you want something you have to work for it. if you don't get it, work harder

tweet.Original_tweet: i am. two of the most important words. for what you out after them shapes reality
tweet.Translate_tweet: i am. two of the most important words. for what you out after them shapes reality

tweet.Original_tweet: today is a perfect day for a perfect day
tweet.Translate_tweet: today is a perfect day for a perfect day

tweet.Original_tweet: never think that gods's delays are god's denials. hold on; hold fast; hold out. patience is genius
tweet.Translate_tweet: never think that gods's delays are god's denials. hold on; hold fast; hold out. patience is genius

tweet.Original_tweet: only one thing has to change for us to know happiness in our lives: where we focus our attention
tweet.Translate_tweet: only one thing has to change for us to know happiness in our lives: where we focus our attention

tweet.Original_tweet: the most successive people are those who are willing to take chances and bet on themselves to win. u are capable of far more than u imagine
tweet.Translate_tweet: the most successive people are those who are willing to take chances and bet on themselves to win. u are capable of far more than u imagine

tweet.Original_tweet: its not about perfect. its about effort. and when you bring that effort everyday, thats where transformation happen. thats how change occurs
tweet.Translate_tweet: its not about perfect. its about effort. and when you bring that effort everyday, thats where transformation happen. thats how change occurs

tweet.Original_tweet: when you need something to believe in, start with yourself
tweet.Translate_tweet: when you need something to believe in, start with yourself

tweet.Original_tweet: now and then its good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy
tweet.Translate_tweet: now and then its good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy

tweet.Original_tweet: in our daily life we must see that it is not happiness that makes us grateful, but gratefulness that makes us happy
tweet.Translate_tweet: in our daily life we must see that it is not happiness that makes us grateful, but gratefulness that makes us happy

tweet.Original_tweet: nothing last forever, not even your problems #staypositive
tweet.Translate_tweet: nothing last forever, not even your problems #staypositive

tweet.Original_tweet: above all, do not stop
tweet.Translate_tweet: above all, do not stop

tweet.Original_tweet: no more effort is required to aim high in life, to demand abundance and prosperity, than is required to accept misery and poverty
tweet.Translate_tweet: no more effort is required to aim high in life, to demand abundance and prosperity, than is required to accept misery and poverty

tweet.Original_tweet: success come to those who become success conscious
tweet.Translate_tweet: success come to those who become success conscious

tweet.Original_tweet: one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day
tweet.Translate_tweet: one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day

tweet.Original_tweet: a year from now you will wish you had started today
tweet.Translate_tweet: a year from now you will wish you had started today

tweet.Original_tweet: never give up on a dream because of the time it'll take to accomplish. the time will pass anyway
tweet.Translate_tweet: never give up on a dream because of the time it'll take to accomplish. the time will pass anyway

tweet.Original_tweet: under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse, and regret
tweet.Translate_tweet: under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse, and regret

tweet.Original_tweet: combining curiosity and hope can yield extraordinary results
tweet.Translate_tweet: combining curiosity and hope can yield extraordinary results

tweet.Original_tweet: find the good and praise it
tweet.Translate_tweet: find the good and praise it

tweet.Original_tweet: what you do today can improve all your tomorrows
tweet.Translate_tweet: what you do today can improve all your tomorrows

tweet.Original_tweet: every bad situation will have something positive. even a dead clock shows correct time twice a day. stay positive in life
tweet.Translate_tweet: every bad situation will have something positive. even a dead clock shows correct time twice a day. stay positive in life

tweet.Original_tweet: the future can't be predicted, but it can be envisioned and brought lovingly into being
tweet.Translate_tweet: the future can't be predicted, but it can be envisioned and brought lovingly into being

tweet.Original_tweet: celebrate the progress you are making in life
tweet.Translate_tweet: celebrate the progress you are making in life

tweet.Original_tweet: every pro was once an amateur. every expert was once a beginner. dream big and start now
tweet.Translate_tweet: every pro was once an amateur. every expert was once a beginner. dream big and start now

tweet.Original_tweet: no shortcuts. work for it
tweet.Translate_tweet: no shortcuts. work for it

tweet.Original_tweet: in god i trust
tweet.Translate_tweet: in god i trust

tweet.Original_tweet: i am too positive to be doubtful, too optimistic to be fearful, and too determined to be defeated
tweet.Translate_tweet: i am too positive to be doubtful, too optimistic to be fearful, and too determined to be defeated

tweet.Original_tweet: life is full of give and take. give thanks and take nothing for granted
tweet.Translate_tweet: life is full of give and take. give thanks and take nothing for granted

tweet.Original_tweet: do not regret growing older. it is a privilege denied to many
tweet.Translate_tweet: do not regret growing older. it is a privilege denied to many

tweet.Original_tweet: you were given this life because you are strong enough to live it
tweet.Translate_tweet: you were given this life because you are strong enough to live it

tweet.Original_tweet: people say "just be yourself" obviously they don't know me.
tweet.Translate_tweet: people say "just be yourself" obviously they don't know me.

tweet.Original_tweet: i'm so scared. please just hold me.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i'm so scared. please just hold me.

tweet.Original_tweet: i wan things to be back the way they used to be.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i wan things to be back the way they used to be.

tweet.Original_tweet: why did you changed?
tweet.Translate_tweet: why did you changed?

tweet.Original_tweet: i wanna pull the trigger.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i wanna pull the trigger.

tweet.Original_tweet: i don't miss him, i miss who i thought he was.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i don't miss him, i miss who i thought he was.

tweet.Original_tweet: nothing hurts more than realizing he meant everything to you, but you meant nothing to him.
tweet.Translate_tweet: nothing hurts more than realizing he meant everything to you, but you meant nothing to him.

tweet.Original_tweet: a million words would not bring you back, i know because i tried. neither would a million tears, i know because i cried.
tweet.Translate_tweet: a million words would not bring you back, i know because i tried. neither would a million tears, i know because i cried.

tweet.Original_tweet: you hurt me more than i deserve, how can you be so cruel? i love you more than you deserve, why am i such a fool?
tweet.Translate_tweet: you hurt me more than i deserve, how can you be so cruel? i love you more than you deserve, why am i such a fool?

tweet.Original_tweet: while i was holding on, all you did was let go.
tweet.Translate_tweet: while i was holding on, all you did was let go.

tweet.Original_tweet: if you love me so much, why are you walking away?
tweet.Translate_tweet: if you love me so much, why are you walking away?

tweet.Original_tweet: i gave you everything, but it wasn't enough to make you stay.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i gave you everything, but it wasn't enough to make you stay.

tweet.Original_tweet: our sweetest songs are those that tell of the saddest thoughts.
tweet.Translate_tweet: our sweetest songs are those that tell of the saddest thoughts.

tweet.Original_tweet: the hardest thing to do is waking up without you.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the hardest thing to do is waking up without you.

tweet.Original_tweet: we always ignore the ones who adore us, and adore those who ignore us.
tweet.Translate_tweet: we always ignore the ones who adore us, and adore those who ignore us.

tweet.Original_tweet: as soon as forever is through, i'll be over you.
tweet.Translate_tweet: as soon as forever is through, i'll be over you.

tweet.Original_tweet: when my absence doesn't alter your life, then my presence has no meaning in it.
tweet.Translate_tweet: when my absence doesn't alter your life, then my presence has no meaning in it.

tweet.Original_tweet: relationships are like glass. sometimes it's better to leave them broken than try to hurt yourself putting it back together.
tweet.Translate_tweet: relationships are like glass. sometimes it's better to leave them broken than try to hurt yourself putting it back together.

tweet.Original_tweet: i hate being second to those i put first.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i hate being second to those i put first.

tweet.Original_tweet: it hurts to let go, but sometimes it hurts more to hold on.
tweet.Translate_tweet: it hurts to let go, but sometimes it hurts more to hold on.

tweet.Original_tweet: i hate the way that, even though i've moved on, you still sneak into my mind.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i hate the way that, even though i've moved on, you still sneak into my mind.

tweet.Original_tweet: it's hard to take a role in someone's life when you're not even part of the script.
tweet.Translate_tweet: it's hard to take a role in someone's life when you're not even part of the script.

tweet.Original_tweet: the hardest things to let go of are the things you never really had.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the hardest things to let go of are the things you never really had.

tweet.Original_tweet: waiting for you is like waiting for rain in a drought - useless and disappointing.
tweet.Translate_tweet: waiting for you is like waiting for rain in a drought - useless and disappointing.

tweet.Original_tweet: one of the worst things that can happen to a person is to be forgotten by someone they will never forget.
tweet.Translate_tweet: one of the worst things that can happen to a person is to be forgotten by someone they will never forget.

tweet.Original_tweet: i dont know why they call it heartbreak. it feels like every part of my body is broken too.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i dont know why they call it heartbreak. it feels like every part of my body is broken too.

tweet.Original_tweet: the hardest part of dreaming about someone you love is having to wake up.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the hardest part of dreaming about someone you love is having to wake up.

tweet.Original_tweet: clowns wear a face that's painted intentionally on them so they appear to be happy or sad. what kind of mask are you wearing today?
tweet.Translate_tweet: clowns wear a face that's painted intentionally on them so they appear to be happy or sad. what kind of mask are you wearing today?

tweet.Original_tweet: usually when people are sad, they don't do anything. they just cry over their condition. but when they get angry, they bring about a change.
tweet.Translate_tweet: usually when people are sad, they don't do anything. they just cry over their condition. but when they get angry, they bring about a change.

tweet.Original_tweet: better never to have met you in my dream than to wake and reach for hands that are not there.
tweet.Translate_tweet: better never to have met you in my dream than to wake and reach for hands that are not there.

tweet.Original_tweet: ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
tweet.Translate_tweet: ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.

tweet.Original_tweet: i miss you more than words can say
tweet.Translate_tweet: i miss you more than words can say

tweet.Original_tweet: i wish i could be good enough.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i wish i could be good enough.

tweet.Original_tweet: i have a eating disorder, but no one would ever notice that i need help. who would believe the fat kid anyway?
tweet.Translate_tweet: i have a eating disorder, but no one would ever notice that i need help. who would believe the fat kid anyway?

tweet.Original_tweet: it's been so long. we've seen other people. but i still cry when i think of us. i guess letting go is harder than i thought.
tweet.Translate_tweet: it's been so long. we've seen other people. but i still cry when i think of us. i guess letting go is harder than i thought.

tweet.Original_tweet: sometimes all i see is the pain in your eyes
tweet.Translate_tweet: sometimes all i see is the pain in your eyes

tweet.Original_tweet: i lie awake missing your arms, wishing i was in them
tweet.Translate_tweet: i lie awake missing your arms, wishing i was in them

tweet.Original_tweet: why do i feel so alone?
tweet.Translate_tweet: why do i feel so alone?

tweet.Original_tweet: why is your ego and pride more important than your love for me?
tweet.Translate_tweet: why is your ego and pride more important than your love for me?

tweet.Original_tweet: you let me stay in my misery
tweet.Translate_tweet: you let me stay in my misery

tweet.Original_tweet: no you wouldn't. you would just let me cry
tweet.Translate_tweet: no you wouldn't. you would just let me cry

tweet.Original_tweet: you don't care. you don't care at all.
tweet.Translate_tweet: you don't care. you don't care at all.

tweet.Original_tweet: i hate this world.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i hate this world.

tweet.Original_tweet: why are you so mean?
tweet.Translate_tweet: why are you so mean?

tweet.Original_tweet: best friends is just another word for betrayal
tweet.Translate_tweet: best friends is just another word for betrayal

tweet.Original_tweet: fake people. fake world.
tweet.Translate_tweet: fake people. fake world.

tweet.Original_tweet: sometimes surviving is the worst kind of pain.
tweet.Translate_tweet: sometimes surviving is the worst kind of pain.

tweet.Original_tweet: today is a bad day
tweet.Translate_tweet: today is a bad day

tweet.Original_tweet: i'm so sorry, i've been awful
tweet.Translate_tweet: i'm so sorry, i've been awful

tweet.Original_tweet: i hate you, you're so rude!
tweet.Translate_tweet: i hate you, you're so rude!
